name: Here On The Moon
description:
Hello, my name is Daniela Sanchez-Olivares, I am a 19-year-old Latinx Film Maker living in New York City.

Here On the Moon is based on a poem I wrote in high school. I rediscovered it while roaming through files and started to develop the story's future. Far away from anything and anybody you fill your time with trinkets in your small home. However, you start to wonder about the life beyond your small planet and the possibilities it holds. It's a story about isolation and conquering the fear of connecting to others. Now it has become a hyperlink text game and will soon the story will be developed into a children's storybook.
